alert.note: Alert for Crowley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 10:41PM MDT until June 08 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KIOWA AND EAST CENTRAL CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 1041 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Arlington, or 23 miles north of La Junta, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arlington and Blue Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
